summary:
For over 15 years, I have had the privilege to be part of a life-changing process for hundreds of women who suffered from vulvodynia. My collaboration with the gynaecologist Dr Liora Abramov, one of the leading experts in vulvodynia in Israel, led me onto this path. From there, after eight years of practice and extensive research, I wrote the first detailed article ever published in the professional Chinese medicine literature about vulvodynia. 

Now, as always, I am committed to continuing learning and extending my knowledge in this area, raising awareness of vulvodynia and the resulting success of my treatment has become my mission.
I have been doing this by writing articles, and blogs, and giving lectures in this field, and since 2019 I have been teaching workshops for fellow practitioners in both English and Hebrew.

Connect with me here on LinkedIn and message me if you want to collaborate or make an appointment for a consultation.

[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': None, 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Tel Aviv, Israel', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': None, 'description': 'In this 6-hour workshop, I share my vast knowledge and clinical experience in the treatment of vulvodynia and vaginal pain, aiming to provide Chinese medicine practitioners with the tools and knowledge of how to approach and treat people with chronic vulvar and vaginal pain, whether they arrived at their clinic with the pain as their main complaint or it was discovered indirectly.

The topics presented in the workshop:
- Western medicine approach: anatomy, definition, diagnosis and treatments
- The Chinese medicine aspect: aetiology, syndromes, treatment strategy
- The different approaches I follow: Shang Han Lun, Yin Fire and Master Tung
- Acupuncture: combinations, methods and modifications 
- Herbal treatment: formulas and modifications 
- Diet and lifestyle changes, unstudied topical and additional natural treatments. 
- The influence this specific pain has on mental, personal and social aspects will be elaborated as well as how to approach and interrogate people with vulvar pain.
- Presentation of case stories

April 2019 - Tel Aviv, Israel
October 2019 - Tel Aviv, Israel
June 2020 - Academie Qing Bai, Amersfoort, The Netherlands
March 2021 - online workshop in Hebrew
